movie.title: Another Heaven
movie.description_intro: A pair of hard-boiled Tokyo cops are investigating a gruesome murder: after killing the victim, the murderer cut his skull open and cooked his brain in a stew. As they try to track down the killer, they discover that, quite literally, everybody is a suspect. Will they bring the terror to an end, or will they become part of it themselves?
movie.description_full: A pair of hard-boiled Tokyo cops are investigating a gruesome murder: after killing the victim, the murderer cut his skull open and cooked his brain in a stew. As they try to track down the killer, they discover that, quite literally, everybody is a suspect. Will they bring the terror to an end, or will they become part of it themselves?

movies.title: White Tiger
movies.summary: Three crooks pull off a magnificent crime. As they're forced to hide out together they slowly begin to distrust each other.
movies.description_full: Three crooks pull off a magnificent crime. As they're forced to hide out together they slowly begin to distrust each other.
movies.synopsis: Three crooks pull off a magnificent crime. As they're forced to hide out together they slowly begin to distrust each other.

movies.title: The Quarry
movies.summary: After murdering a traveling preacher, a fugitive drifter travels to a small town and poses as the man he killed. Though the congregation loves the drifter's sermons of forgiveness, the local police chief is suspicious of the man. Soon a gruesome discovery at a local quarry forces the killer to fight for his freedom.
movies.description_full: After murdering a traveling preacher, a fugitive drifter travels to a small town and poses as the man he killed. Soon a gruesome discovery at a local quarry forces the killer to fight for his freedom.

movies.title: The Swindlers
movies.summary: High stakes and fast talk are the game in this crime caper that brings together an all-star cast as unlikely allies from different sides of the law. Each member of the team has their own motives, but they'll have to work together to achieve their common goal-trapping the world's most legendary con man.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in Brooklyn
movies.title_english: Once Upon a Time in Brooklyn
movies.title_long: Once Upon a Time in Brooklyn (2013)
movies.summary: After serving several prison sentences, Bobby Baldano is out. Craving a life of inescapable crime, but desperate to honor his family, Bobby must decide whether to make his family proud or destroy what generations of Baldanos have built before him. A twist ending reveals what truths Bobby always knew forcing him to make a life altering decision. One wrong move could be his last.

A twist ending reveals what truths Bobby always knew forcing him to make a life altering decision. One wrong move could be his last.
